      • getRawValue

        int getRawValue(short ch,
              int encoderId)
        Get raw encoder value register
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        encoderId - Index number of encoder
        Returns:
        Raw encoder value in step

      • resetEncoders

        void resetEncoders(short ch)
        Reset all encoders register to 0 value
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)

      • setEncodersParameter

        void setEncodersParameter(short ch,
                        int encoderId,
                        int increment,
                        boolean direction,
                        int mode)
        Setup encoder configuration for scan mode
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        encoderId - Index number of encoder
        increment - Number of step for one acquisition
        direction - Reverse counting direction. true:positive, false:negative
        mode - Define counting mode. 0:quadrature, 1:step/dir
